detail_desc: Sandals with wide, crossover straps at the front and elastic around the heel. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in a soft slub cotton jersey and viscose blend with a deep V-neck at the front and seam centre back.
Baby Exclusive. Leather sandals with a strap with a hook and loop fastener at one side. Leather insoles and rubber soles (size Newborn-0 with soft soles).
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in a viscose and linen weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, side pockets and tapered legs.
Wide blouse in woven fabric with elastication and decorative gathers around the neckline and a small frilled collar. Long raglan sleeves with wide smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs.

Short dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Deep V-neck, wrapover top and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a raw-edge hem.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, tie belt and zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets with a decorative flap and button, and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in a soft viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and an elasticated hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lace-covered V-neck front and back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in an airy weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a seam with a small frill trim at the shoulders and waist. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbing at the top.
Trousers in a textured viscose weave with a high waist, detachable tie belt, hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Fake side and back pockets and tapered legs.
Silk kimono with dropped shoulders, wide 3/4-length sleeves with a contrasting colour trim at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt.
Short skirt in imitation suede with imitation leather sections. Decorative, zipped front pockets and a visible zip at the back. Lined.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist and fake fly. Side pockets, a back pocket and elasticated hems.
Sleeveless dress in tulle with a sequined satin bodice with an outer mesh layer, and a seam at the waist with a glittery elastic waistband and a skirt in several layers of tulle. Lined.
Top in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a scalloped edge and broderie anglaise at the top.
Ankle boots in suede with a soft shaft. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Maxi dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Smocked seam at the waist and a skirt that is longer at the back. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top and silicone on the inside of the heels for a better fit.
Cap with a twill front and mesh back. Appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim fit.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton with a collar, small embroidery detail on the chest, yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.
Jumper in a knit containing some wool with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Playsuit in patterned jersey with narrow shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbing at the cuffs. Bottoms in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist.
Pyjama bottoms in soft flannel made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide, gently tapered legs.

Short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton weave with a tie or bow tie. Shirt with a collar, classic front, yoke with a pleat at the back and rounded hem. Pre-tied tie or bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener.
Jacket in soft pile with a pile-lined hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short, tiered skirt in an airy cotton weave. Regular waist with wide smocking.
Wide-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves and an opening with a strap at the back. Slightly longer at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Peak lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with one covered button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Shorter-style blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a seam with a tie detail at the hem.
Trainers with a padded edge and lacing at the front. imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Short-sleeved shirt in cotton poplin with a button-down collar, open chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Top in light sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style jumper in a fine-knit alpaca blend with a round, ribbed neckline, low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Plastic hair claw. Width 8.5 cm.
Short top in ribbed cotton jersey with a wide, round neckline, long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Knee-length skirt in mesh with an embroidered pattern and elasticated waist. Lined.
Cropped, V-neck top with a lace front, woven back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, long sleeves with metal buttons at the cuffs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hairband in denim-look woven fabric with a knot detail at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Base layer set with a top and pair of tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for optimal comfort. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Tights with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, double-breasted coat in felted fabric with a detachable faux fur collar and velvet-covered buttons. Diagonal front pockets and shaping darts at the back. Lined.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and diagonal side pockets.

Long-sleeved, checked shirt in lightweight cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, yoke with a pleat at the back, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight, knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a wrapover top and V-neck with a hook-and-eye fastener. Long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and skirt with pleats. Unlined.
Oversized jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shopper in sturdy fabric with two handles and a magnetic press-stud fastener. Unlined.
Sarong in an airy weave. Size 130x150 cm.
Leggings in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist and a lace trim at the hems.
Fabric belt with an adjustable metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with raw, roll edges around the sleeves and hem.
Trousers in wide-wale organic cotton corduroy with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, narrow, adjustable straps that can be fastened in different ways. Elastication at the hem and a metal fastener at the back.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Scarf in patterned mulberry silk. Size 80x80 cm.
V-neck cardigan in a soft rib knit with buttons down the front and dropped shoulders. Long sleeves, patch pockets and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in lace with short cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Partly lined in jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif and appliqués at the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Short skirt in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with an elasticated waist that has a small frill trim at the top. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and tapered legs with foldover ribbing at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Calf-length dress in a linen and cotton weave with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Buttons down the front, smocking at the back and a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Lined.
Short, high-waisted shorts in a cotton poplin pattern weave with ties at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and frill trim at the hems.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
Opaque matt tights. 200 denier.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and elasticated crossover straps at the waist and sides. High-cut at the back.

A-line dress in airy chiffon with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Frill trimmed seam at the top and long, wide sleeves with a frill-trimmed seam. Lined.

Long dress in an airy weave with a round, gathered neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, slightly wider raglan sleeves, smocking a the waist and a softly draping, gathered skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons.
Sun visor in braided straw with covered elastication at the back and a fabric sweatband.
